content: **note ** if you are using self-striping or self-patterning yarn and want your mitts to match perfectly you will need more than 110 yards of yarn the mitts in the photo were made with only one ball of diakeito diamusée and they do not match perfectly **size ** - to fit child teen woman man - palm circumference 6 5 7 25 8 8 75 /16 5 18 5 20 25 22 25 cm
